Professional Embroidery Services

Expert embroidery for logos, text, and custom designs with professional-grade equipment and fast turnaround times.

Why Choose Embroidery?

Embroidery offers unmatched durability and professional appearance. Unlike printing, embroidered designs won't fade, crack, or peel over time. They're perfect for:

  • Corporate uniforms and professional apparel
  • Team jerseys and sports apparel
  • Promotional items and branded merchandise
  • High-quality gifts and awards
  • Items that require frequent washing

Embroidery Process Image

Our Embroidery Process

From concept to completion, we ensure quality at every step

1

Design Review

We review your logo or design to ensure it's suitable for embroidery and make any necessary adjustments.

2

Digitizing

Your design is converted into an embroidery file using our in-house digitizing expertise.

3

Sample Creation

We create a sample to ensure perfect placement, sizing, and thread colors before full production.

4

Production

Your order is embroidered using professional-grade machines with careful quality control.

5

Quality Check

Every item is inspected for quality before packaging and shipping to ensure perfect results.

Embroidery Pricing

Our embroidery pricing is based on:

  • Design complexity: Number of colors and detail level
  • Quantity: Better rates for larger orders
  • Garment type: Different materials may affect pricing
  • Placement: Standard positions or custom placement

Contact us for a personalized quote based on your specific needs. We offer competitive rates with no hidden fees.
